TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Behavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示由 管理的 对象。

span.span: Represents the objects that are managed by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可以扩展以开发任何类型的用户界面行为，包括选择、 拖动和调整大小行为。This class can be extended to develop any type of user interface behavior, including selection, drag, and resize behaviors. 有关详细信息，请参阅[行为服务概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f). > [!NOTE] > 你类型必须与关联类型。Your type must be associated with a type. 不支持独立于标志符号的行为。Glyph-independent behaviors are not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建您自己的类基于响应用户单击的类。The following code example demonstrates how to create your own class based on the class that responds to user clicks. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父行为是由维护行为堆栈上的下一步行为。The parent behavior is the next behavior on the behavior stack maintained by the . 如果`callParentBehavior`参数是`true`，则`behaviorService`参数不能`null`。If the `callParentBehavior` parameter is `true`, then the `behaviorService` parameter must not be `null`. `callParentBehavior` 指示是否基类应调用的父行为，，然后允许选择正确的父行为。`callParentBehavior` indicates whether the base class should call the parent behavior, and then allow the select the correct parent behavior.

span.span: is , and is .

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否应该禁用 对象。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether objects should be disabled.

value.span: 如果所有设计器接收的对象应具有状态设置为已启用 = false时这活动; 否则为。

span.span: if all objects the designer receives should have states set to Enabled = false when this is active; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`true`值属性指示到，所有设计器接收的对象应具有其状态已禁用此行为处于活动状态时。A `true` value for the property indicates to the that all objects the designer receives should have their state disabled when this behavior is active. 属性与结合工作方法，以便你可以自定义标志符号和行为之间的交互。The property works in conjunction with the method so you can customize the interaction between glyphs and behaviors. 下表汇总了对的调用的结果为特定。The following table summarizes the results of a call to for a particular . || 为 `true` is `true`| 为 `false` is `false`| |-|-|-| |命中测试的标志符号已分配的行为Hit-tested glyph has an assigned behavior|如果具有指定`command ID`中找到，则该禁用和返回。If the with the specified `command ID` is found in the , that is disabled and returned. 否则将返回 `null`。Otherwise, `null` is returned.| 对该行为调用和，如果找到，则该行为的返回。 is called on the behavior and, if found, the behavior’s is returned. 否则为结果具有指定`command ID`返回。Otherwise, the result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.| |命中测试的标志符号已没有分配的行为Hit-tested glyph has no assigned behavior|结果具有指定`command ID`返回。The result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.|结果具有指定`command ID`返回。The result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.|

span.span: The default implementation always returns .

summary.span: 在丢失鼠标捕获时由装饰器窗口调用。

span.span: Called by the adorner window when it loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行为可以通过将本身推送到行为堆栈请求通过行为服务鼠标捕获方法。A behavior can request mouse capture through the behavior service by pushing itself onto the behavior stack with the method. 如果情况如此，它将通过通知方法捕获时丢失。If it does so, it will be notified through the method when capture is lost. 通常行为本身从堆栈中移除这次。Generally the behavior removes itself from the stack at this time. 当发生以下操作之一时，捕获将丢失：Capture is lost when one of the following actions occurs: - 其他人请求捕获。Someone else requests capture. - 推送另一个行为。Another behavior is pushed. - 此行为已被移除。This behavior is removed. 在每个这些情况下，将对该行为调用。In each of these cases, will be called on the behavior.

public: virtual bool OnMouseDoubleClick(System::Windows::Forms::Design::Behavior::Glyph ^ g, System::Windows::Forms::MouseButtons button, System::Drawing::Point mouseLoc);

span.span: A .

param.name: button
param.span: 一个 值，指示单击了哪个按钮。

span.span: A value indicating which button was clicked.
The location at which the click occurred.

summary.span: 在任何双击消息进入 的装饰器窗口时调用。

span.span: Called when any double-click message enters the adorner window of the .

returns.span: 如果消息已处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the message was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时任何双击消息进入调用方法`WndProc`的修饰工具窗口的。The method is called when any double-click message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 消息首先在这里，传递给最顶层行为堆栈中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 返回`true`从此方法表示该消息已处理通过，不应继续进行处理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 从此处，将消息发送到相应的行为。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理双击消息。The following code example demonstrates how to handle a double-click message. 有关完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 扩展的外观和行为的控件在设计模式下](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/CS/DesignerDemoControl.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/VB/DesignerDemoControl.vb#10)]

The location at which the click occurred.

summary.span: 在任何鼠标按下消息进入 的装饰器窗口时调用。

span.span: Called when any mouse-down message enters the adorner window of the .

returns.span: 如果消息已处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the message was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法称为当鼠标按下的任何消息进入`WndProc`的修饰工具窗口的。The method is called when any mouse-down message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 消息首先在这里，传递给最顶层行为堆栈中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 返回`true`从此方法表示该消息已处理通过，不应继续进行处理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 从此处，将消息发送到相应的行为。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时任何鼠标弹起消息进入调用方法`WndProc`的修饰工具窗口的。The method is called when any mouse-up message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 消息首先在这里，传递给最顶层行为堆栈中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 返回`true`从此方法表示该消息已处理通过，不应继续进行处理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 从此处，将消息发送到相应的行为。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
